data.title: West Ham On TV
data.meta_description: View listings of West Ham on TV in the UK including their Premier League matches on Sky Sports, TNT Sports and Amazon Prime Video.
data.text:
When is the next West Ham United game on TV?

The next West Ham United game on TV is West Ham United v Manchester City on Saturday 31st August 2024 in the Premier League and the match kicks off at 5:30pm.

What channel is the West Ham United game on?

The West Ham United v Manchester City game will be shown live on Sky Sports Main Event, Sky Sports Premier League and Sky Sports Ultra HDR.
